alert.note: Alert for Indiana; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 27 at 3:28PM EST until November 27 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA AND SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND COUNTIES... At 327 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Homer City to 6 miles northwest of Westmont to near Boswell, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Indiana, Homer City, Black Lick, Clymer, New Florence, Chevy Chase Heights, Seward, Bolivar, Vintondale, Cherry Tree, Glen Campbell, and Armagh. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
